Como puedo adquirir una membresía

Sanchez José- Tenemos dos tipos de membresías diferentes. La Membresía Dorada y la Membresía de Negocio. Ambas membresías cuestan $65 y te permiten comprar en todos los almacenes de Costco y en línea en http://Costco.com. Cualquiera de las membresías se pueden actualizar a una Membresía Ejecutiva por $130, la cual le ofrece una recompensa de 2% en sus compras (se aplican exclusiones) y también tiene ciertas ventajas y/o descuentos en muchos de nuestros servicios. Ambas membresías vienen con dos tarjetas, por lo cual puede compartir los beneficios de ser socio con alguien en su hogar de la edad de 16 años o mayor. Para comprar en línea, visite aquí: https://www.costco.com/join-costco.html?redirectLogin=true ¡Gracias! -Gerry
Thank you Costco wish you could bring back combo pizza

Hazel- You can view pricing for this product on our website here: https://www.costco.com/ProductDisplay?catalogId=10701... Thanks for asking! -Bekah

Now yesterday I got a call yesterday informing that my old frame is rejected because my eye lash is too big. Although the same frame was used last year. It appears that Costco optical is forcing me to buy a new frame every year or Costco thinks its frame is so poor quality that it should not last for more than 1 year. I do not like this policy/behavior of optical department. In my opinion, the only logical reason of it can be forcing me to buy new frame every year.

LOL!!!! You sound ridiculous.

really? Why don't you ask about all the racism I've experienced in my life. How I couldn't get jobs because I was white. How I couldn't go to college because I didn't qualify for financial aid because I was white and had two parents alive even though I didn't live at home and they were divorced. How the black ladies at the welfare office told me to my face I couldn't get any help (when I was a battered wife and became homeless) because I was white. And I'll never forget their faces as they laughed at me at one of the worst moments in my life. How that when I moved to a black neighborhood people treated me poorly and called me names and stole from me. How when I was a student (Elementary school through High School) the black girls would threatened to beat me up for literally no reason which caused me to leave class as quickly as possible and run home. Yeah, that's all "ridiculous".

LOL!!! You still sound ridiculous. You were a battered wife and homeless because you were white? Try not smart enough to not let a man beat you up. You couldn't get a job because you were white?
